approved_enrollment.approved_messageBody:
Dear Student,

We are pleased to inform you that your enrollment in the Alternative Learning System (ALS) has been approved.
Please find your temporary login credentials below:

Temporary Username: {tempUsername}
Temporary Password: {tempPassword}

For your security, you will be required to change your password upon your first login.

We look forward to supporting your learning journey.

Sincerely,
The Cabuyao ALS Team

rejected_enrollment.rejected_messageBody:
Dear Student,

We regret to inform you that your enrollment in the Alternative Learning System (ALS) has not been accepted at this time.

Reason: {reason}

If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sincerely,
The Cabuyao ALS Team

student.subject: You have successfully submit your FLT.
student.messageBody: Thank you for submitting your FLT. An email will be sent to you once assessment is done.
